   21: %%
   22: -module(dtls_api_SUITE).
   23: 
   24: %% Callback functions
   25: -export([all/0,
   26:          groups/0,
   27:          init_per_suite/1,
   28:          end_per_suite/1,
   29:          init_per_group/2,
   30:          end_per_group/2,
   31:          init_per_testcase/2,
   32:          end_per_testcase/2]).
   33: 
   34: %% Testcases
   35: -export([
   36:          replay_window/0, replay_window/1,
   37:          dtls_listen_owner_dies/0,
   38:          dtls_listen_owner_dies/1,
   39:          dtls_listen_close/0,
   40:          dtls_listen_close/1,
   41:          dtls_listen_reopen/0,
   42:          dtls_listen_reopen/1,
   43:          dtls_listen_two_sockets_1/0,
   44:          dtls_listen_two_sockets_1/1,
   45:          dtls_listen_two_sockets_2/0,
   46:          dtls_listen_two_sockets_2/1,
   47:          dtls_listen_two_sockets_3/0,
   48:          dtls_listen_two_sockets_3/1,
   49:          dtls_listen_two_sockets_4/0,
   50:          dtls_listen_two_sockets_4/1,
   51:          dtls_listen_two_sockets_5/0,
   52:          dtls_listen_two_sockets_5/1,
   53:          dtls_listen_two_sockets_6/0,
   54:          dtls_listen_two_sockets_6/1,
   55:          client_restarts/0, client_restarts/1,
   56:          client_restarts_multiple_acceptors/1
   57:         ]).
   58: 
   59: -include("ssl_test_lib.hrl").
   60: -include_lib("ssl/src/ssl_internal.hrl").
   61: 
   62: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   63: %% Common Test interface functions -----------------------------------
   64: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   65: all() ->
   66:     [
   67:      replay_window,
   68:      {group, 'dtlsv1.2'},
   69:      {group, 'dtlsv1'}
   70:     ].
   71: 
   72: groups() ->
   73:     [
   74:      {'dtlsv1.2', [],  api_tests()},
   75:      {'dtlsv1', [],  api_tests()}
   76:     ].
   77: 
   78: api_tests() ->
   79:     [
   80:      dtls_listen_owner_dies,
   81:      dtls_listen_close,
   82:      dtls_listen_reopen,
   83:      dtls_listen_two_sockets_1,
   84:      dtls_listen_two_sockets_2,
   85:      dtls_listen_two_sockets_3,
   86:      dtls_listen_two_sockets_4,
   87:      dtls_listen_two_sockets_5,
   88:      dtls_listen_two_sockets_6,
   89:      client_restarts,
   90:      client_restarts_multiple_acceptors
   91:     ].
   92: 
   93: init_per_suite(Config0) ->
   94:     catch crypto:stop(),
   95:     try crypto:start() of
   96: 	ok ->
   97: 	    ssl_test_lib:clean_start(),
   98: 	    ssl_test_lib:make_rsa_cert(Config0)
   99:     catch _:_ ->
  100: 	    {skip, "Crypto did not start"}
  101:     end.
  102: 
  103: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
  104:     ssl:stop(),
  105:     application:unload(ssl),
  106:     application:stop(crypto).
  107: 
  108: 
  109: init_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  110:     ssl_test_lib:init_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  111: 
  112: end_per_group(GroupName, Config) ->
  113:     ssl_test_lib:end_per_group(GroupName, Config).
  114: 
  115: init_per_testcase(Testcase, Config)
  116:   when Testcase =:= dtls_listen_two_sockets_1 orelse
  117:        Testcase =:= dtls_listen_two_sockets_5 orelse
  118:        Testcase =:= dtls_listen_two_sockets_6 ->
  119:     case ssl:listen(0, [{protocol, dtls}, {ip, {127,0,0,2}}]) of
  120:         {ok, S} ->
  121:             test_listen_on_all_interfaces(S, Config),
  122:             ssl:close(S),
  123:             ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  124:             ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  125:             maybe_skip_tc_on_windows(Testcase, Config);
  126:         {error, _} ->
  127:             {skip, "127.0.0.x address not available"}
  128:     end;
  129: init_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->
  130:     ssl_test_lib:ct_log_supported_protocol_versions(Config),
  131:     ct:timetrap({seconds, 10}),
  132:     Config.
  133: 
  134: end_per_testcase(_TestCase, Config) ->     
  135:     Config.
  136: 
  137: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  138: %% Test Cases --------------------------------------------------------
  139: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  140: 
  141: dtls_listen_owner_dies() ->
  142:     [{doc, "Test that you can start new DTLS 'listner' if old owner dies"}].
  143: 
  144: dtls_listen_owner_dies(Config) when is_list(Config) ->    
  145:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_opts, Config),
  146:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  147:     {_, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  148: 
  149:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(ServerNode),
  150:     Test = self(),
  151:     Pid = spawn(fun() -> {ok, _} =
  152:                              ssl:listen(Port, [{protocol, dtls} | ServerOpts]),
  153:                          {error, _} = ssl:listen(Port, [{protocol, dtls} | ServerOpts]),
  154:                          Test ! {self(), listened}
  155:                 end),
  156:     receive
  157:         {Pid, listened} ->
  158:             ok
  159:     end,
  160:     {ok, LSocket} = ssl:listen(Port, [{protocol, dtls} | ServerOpts]),
  161:     spawn(fun() -> 
  162:                   {ok, ASocket} = ssl:transport_accept(LSocket),
  163:                   {ok, Socket} = ssl:handshake(ASocket),
  164:                    receive 
  165:                        {ssl, Socket, "from client"} ->
  166:                            ssl:send(Socket, "from server"),
  167:                            ssl:close(Socket)
  168:                    end
  169:           end),
  170:     {ok, Client} = ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, ClientOpts),
  171: 
  172:     ssl:send(Client, "from client"),
  173:     receive 
  174:         {ssl, Client, "from server"} ->
  175:             ssl:close(Client)
  176:     end.
  177: 
  178: 
  179: dtls_listen_close() ->
  180:     [{doc, "Test that you close a DTLS 'listner' socket"}].
  181: 
  182: dtls_listen_close(Config) when is_list(Config) ->    
  183:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  184:     {_, ServerNode, _Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  185: 
  186:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(ServerNode),
  187:     {ok, ListenSocket} = ssl:listen(Port, [{protocol, dtls} | ServerOpts]),
  188:     ok = ssl:close(ListenSocket).
  189: 
  190: 
  191: dtls_listen_reopen() ->
  192:     [{doc, "Test that you close a DTLS 'listner' socket and open a new one for the same port"}].
  193: 
  194: dtls_listen_reopen(Config) when is_list(Config) -> 
  195:     ClientOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  196:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_opts, Config),
  197:     {_, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  198: 
  199:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(ServerNode),
  200:     {ok, LSocket0} = ssl:listen(Port, [{protocol, dtls} | ServerOpts]),
  201:      spawn(fun() ->
  202:                   {ok, ASocket} = ssl:transport_accept(LSocket0),
  203:                    {ok, Socket} = ssl:handshake(ASocket),
  204:                    receive
  205:                        {ssl, Socket, "from client"} ->
  206:                            ssl:send(Socket, "from server 1"),
  207:                            ssl:close(Socket)
  208:                    end
  209:            end),
  210:     {ok, Client1} = ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, ClientOpts),
  211:     ok = ssl:close(LSocket0),
  212:     {ok, LSocket1} = ssl:listen(Port, [{protocol, dtls} | ServerOpts]),
  213:     spawn(fun() ->
  214:                   {ok, ASocket} = ssl:transport_accept(LSocket1),
  215:                   {ok, Socket} = ssl:handshake(ASocket),
  216:                   receive
  217:                       {ssl, Socket, "from client"} ->
  218:                           ssl:send(Socket, "from server 2"),
  219:                           ssl:close(Socket)
  220:                    end
  221:           end),
  222:     {ok, Client2} = ssl:connect(Hostname, Port, [{protocol, dtls} | ClientOpts]),
  223:     ssl:send(Client2, "from client"),
  224:     ssl:send(Client1, "from client"),
  225:     receive
  226:         {ssl, Client1, "from server 1"} ->
  227:             ssl:close(Client1)
  228:     end,
  229:     receive
  230:         {ssl, Client2, "from server 2"} ->
  231:             ssl:close(Client2)
  232:     end.
  233: 
  234: dtls_listen_two_sockets_1() ->
  235:     [{doc, "Test with two DTLS dockets: 127.0.0.2:Port, 127.0.0.3:Port"}].
  236: dtls_listen_two_sockets_1(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
  237:     {ok, S1} = ssl:listen(0, [{protocol, dtls}, {ip, {127,0,0,2}}]),
  238:     {ok, {_, Port}} = ssl:sockname(S1),
  239:     {ok, S2} = ssl:listen(Port, [{protocol, dtls}, {ip, {127,0,0,3}}]),
  240:     ssl:close(S1),
  241:     ssl:close(S2),
  242:     ok.
  243: 
  244: dtls_listen_two_sockets_2() ->
  245:     [{doc, "Test with two DTLS dockets: <all_interfaces>:Port, <all_interfaces>:Port"}].
  246: dtls_listen_two_sockets_2(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
  247:     {ok, S1} = ssl:listen(0, [{protocol, dtls}]),
  248:     {ok, {_, Port}} = ssl:sockname(S1),
  249:     {error, already_listening} =
  250:         ssl:listen(Port, [{protocol, dtls}]),
  251:     ssl:close(S1),
  252:     ok.
  253: 
  254: dtls_listen_two_sockets_3() ->
  255:     [{doc, "Test with two DTLS dockets: <all_interfaces>:Port, <all_interfaces>:Port"}].
  256: dtls_listen_two_sockets_3(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
  257:     {ok, S1} = ssl:listen(0, [{protocol, dtls}]),
  258:     {ok, {_, Port}} = ssl:sockname(S1),
  259:     {error, already_listening} =
  260:         ssl:listen(Port, [{protocol, dtls}]),
  261:     ssl:close(S1),
  262:     {ok, S2} = ssl:listen(Port, [{protocol, dtls}]),
  263:     ssl:close(S2),
  264:     ok.
  265: 
  266: dtls_listen_two_sockets_4() ->
  267:   [{doc, "Test with two DTLS dockets: process1 - <all_interfaces>:Port, process2 - <all_interfaces>:Port"}].
  268: dtls_listen_two_sockets_4(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
  269:     Test = self(),
  270:     Pid = spawn(fun() ->
  271:                   {ok, S1} = ssl:listen(0, [{protocol, dtls}]),
  272:                   {ok, {_, Port0}} = ssl:sockname(S1),
  273:                   Test ! {self(), Port0}
  274:                 end),
  275:     Port =
  276:         receive
  277:             {Pid, Port1} ->
  278:                 Port1
  279:         end,
  280:     {ok, S2} =
  281:         ssl:listen(Port, [{protocol, dtls}]),
  282:     ssl:close(S2),
  283:     ok.
  284: 
  285: dtls_listen_two_sockets_5() ->
  286:     [{doc, "Test with two DTLS dockets: <all_interfaces>:Port, 127.0.0.3:Port"}].
  287: dtls_listen_two_sockets_5(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
  288:     {ok, S1} = ssl:listen(0, [{protocol, dtls}]),
  289:     {ok, {_, Port}} = ssl:sockname(S1),
  290:     {error, already_listening} =
  291:         ssl:listen(Port, [{protocol, dtls}, {ip, {127,0,0,3}}]),
  292:     ssl:close(S1),
  293:     {ok, S2} =
  294:         ssl:listen(Port, [{protocol, dtls}, {ip, {127,0,0,3}}]),
  295:     {error, already_listening} =
  296:         ssl:listen(Port, [{protocol, dtls}]),
  297:     ssl:close(S2),
  298:     ok.
  299: 
  300: dtls_listen_two_sockets_6() ->
  301:     [{doc, "Test with two DTLS dockets: 127.0.0.3:Port, 0.0.0.0:Port"}].
  302: dtls_listen_two_sockets_6(_Config) when is_list(_Config) ->
  303:     {ok, S1} = ssl:listen(0, [{protocol, dtls}, {ip, {127,0,0,3}}]),
  304:     {ok, {_, Port}} = ssl:sockname(S1),
  305:     {error, already_listening} =
  306:         ssl:listen(Port, [{protocol, dtls}, {ip, {0,0,0,0}}]),
  307:     ssl:close(S1),
  308:     ok.
  309: 
  310: replay_window() ->
  311:     [{doc, "Whitebox test of replay window"}].
  312: replay_window(_Config) ->
  313:     W0 = dtls_record:init_replay_window(),
  314:     Size = 58,
  315:     true = replay_window(0, 0, Size-1, [], W0),
  316:     ok.
  317: 
  318: replay_window(N, Top, Sz, Used, W0) when N < 99000 ->
  319:     Bottom = max(0, Top - Sz),
  320:     Seq = max(0, Bottom + rand:uniform(Top-Bottom+10)-5),
  321:     IsReplay = (Seq < Bottom) orelse lists:member(Seq, Used),
  322:     case dtls_record:is_replay(Seq,W0) of
  323:         true when IsReplay ->
  324:             replay_window(N+1, Top, Sz, Used, W0);
  325:         false when (not IsReplay) ->
  326:             #{replay_window:=W1} = dtls_record:update_replay_window(Seq, #{replay_window=>W0}),
  327:             NewTop = if Seq > Top -> Seq;
  328:                         true -> Top
  329:                      end,
  330:             NewBottom = max(0, (NewTop - Sz)),
  331:             NewUsed = lists:dropwhile(fun(S) -> S < NewBottom end,
  332:                                       lists:sort([Seq|Used])),
  333:             replay_window(N+1, NewTop, Sz, NewUsed, W1);
  334:         Replay ->
  335:             io:format("Try: ~p Top: ~w Sz: ~p Used:~p State: ~w~n", [N, Top, Sz, length(Used), W0]),
  336:             io:format("Seq: ~w Replay: ~p (~p)~n ~w~n ~w~n",
  337:                       [Seq, Replay, IsReplay, Used, bits_to_list(W0)]),
  338:             {fail, Replay, Seq, W0}
  339:     end;
  340: replay_window(N, Top, Sz, Used, W0) ->
  341:     io:format("Try: ~p Top: ~w Sz: ~p Used:~p State: ~w~n", [N, Top, Sz, length(Used), W0]),
  342:     io:format("Match ~w ~n", [bits_to_list(W0) =:= Used]),
  343:     bits_to_list(W0) =:= Used.
  344: 
  345: bits_to_list(#{mask := Bits, bottom:= Bottom}) ->
  346:     bits_to_list(Bits, Bottom, []).
  347: 
  348: bits_to_list(0, _, Is) ->
  349:     lists:reverse(Is);
  350: bits_to_list(Bits, I, Acc) ->
  351:     case Bits band 1 of
  352:         1 -> bits_to_list(Bits bsr 1, I+1, [I|Acc]);
  353:         0 -> bits_to_list(Bits bsr 1, I+1, Acc)
  354:     end.
  355: 
  356: client_restarts() ->
  357:     [{doc, "Test re-connection "}].
  358: 
  359: client_restarts(Config) ->
  360:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  361:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  362:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  363: 
  364:     ClientOpts = [{verify, verify_none},{reuse_sessions, save} | ClientOpts0],
  365:     Server =
  366: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  367: 				   {from, self()},
  368:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  369: 				   {options, [{verify, verify_none}|ServerOpts]}]),
  370:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  371:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  372:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  373:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  374:                                          {from, self()},
  375:                                          {options, ClientOpts}]),
  376: 
  377:     ssl_test_lib:send(Client0, Msg1 = "from client 0"),
  378:     ssl_test_lib:send(Server, Msg2 = "from server to client 0"),
  379: 
  380:     Server ! {active_receive, Msg1},
  381:     Client0 ! {active_receive, Msg2},
  382: 
  383:     Msgs = lists:sort([{Server, Msg1}, {Client0, Msg2}]),
  384:     Msgs = lists:sort(flush()),
  385: 
  386:     ReConnect =  %% Whitebox re-connect test
  387:         fun({sslsocket, {gen_udp,_,dtls_gen_connection}, [Pid]} = Socket, ssl) ->
  388:                 ?CT_LOG("Client Socket: ~p ~n", [Socket]),
  389:                 {ok, IntSocket} = gen_statem:call(Pid, {downgrade, self()}),
  390:                 {{Address,CPort},UDPSocket}=IntSocket,
  391:                 ?CT_LOG("Info: ~p~n", [inet:info(UDPSocket)]),
  392: 
  393:                 {ok, #config{transport_info = CbInfo, connection_cb = ConnectionCb,
  394:                              ssl = SslOpts0}} =
  395:                     ssl:handle_options(ClientOpts, client, Address),
  396:                 SslOpts = {SslOpts0, #socket_options{}, undefined},
  397: 
  398:                 ct:sleep(250),
  399:                 ?CT_LOG("Client second connect: ~p ~p~n", [Socket, CbInfo]),
  400:                 {ok, NewSocket} = ssl_gen_statem:connect(ConnectionCb, Address, CPort, IntSocket,
  401:                                                          SslOpts, self(), CbInfo, infinity),
  402:                 {replace, NewSocket}
  403:         end,
  404: 
  405:     Client0 ! {apply, self(), ReConnect},
  406:     receive
  407:         {apply_res, {replace, Res}} ->
  408:             ?CT_LOG("Apply res: ~p~n", [Res]),
  409:             ok;
  410:         ErrMsg ->
  411:             ?CT_LOG("Unhandled: ~p~n", [ErrMsg]),
  412:             ct:fail({wrong_msg, ErrMsg})
  413:     end,
  414: 
  415:     ssl_test_lib:send(Client0, Msg1 = "from client 0"),
  416:     ssl_test_lib:send(Server, Msg2 = "from server to client 0"),
  417: 
  418:     Server ! {active_receive, Msg1},
  419:     Client0 ! {active_receive, Msg2},
  420: 
  421:     Msgs = lists:sort(flush()),
  422: 
  423:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  424:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  425:     ok.
  426: 
  427: 
  428: flush() ->
  429:     receive Msg -> [Msg|flush()]
  430:     after 500 -> []
  431:     end.
  432: 
  433: client_restarts_multiple_acceptors(Config) ->
  434:     %% Can also be tested with openssl by connecting a client and hit
  435:     %% Ctrl-C to kill openssl process, so that the connection is not
  436:     %% closed.
  437:     %% Then do a new openssl connect with the same client port.
  438: 
  439:     ClientOpts0 = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(client_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  440:     ServerOpts = ssl_test_lib:ssl_options(server_rsa_verify_opts, Config),
  441:     {ClientNode, ServerNode, Hostname} = ssl_test_lib:run_where(Config),
  442: 
  443:     ClientOpts = [{verify, verify_none},{reuse_sessions, save} | ClientOpts0],
  444:     Server =
  445: 	ssl_test_lib:start_server([{node, ServerNode}, {port, 0},
  446: 				   {from, self()},
  447:                                    {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  448:                                    {accepters, 2},
  449: 				   {options, [{verify, verify_none}|ServerOpts]}]),
  450:     Port = ssl_test_lib:inet_port(Server),
  451:     Client0 = ssl_test_lib:start_client([{node, ClientNode},
  452:                                          {port, Port}, {host, Hostname},
  453:                                          {mfa, {ssl_test_lib, no_result, []}},
  454:                                          {from, self()},
  455:                                          {options, ClientOpts}]),
  456: 
  457:     Server2 = receive {accepter, 2, Server2Pid} -> Server2Pid
  458:               after 5000 -> ct:fail(msg_timeout)
  459:               end,
  460: 
  461:     ssl_test_lib:send(Client0, Msg1 = "from client 0"),
  462:     ssl_test_lib:send(Server, Msg2 = "from server to client 0"),
  463: 
  464:     Server ! {active_receive, Msg1},
  465:     Client0 ! {active_receive, Msg2},
  466: 
  467:     Msgs = lists:sort([{Server, Msg1}, {Client0, Msg2}]),
  468:     Msgs = lists:sort(flush()),
  469: 
  470:     ReConnect =  %% Whitebox re-connect test
  471:         fun({sslsocket, {gen_udp,_,dtls_gen_connection}, [Pid]} = Socket, ssl) ->
  472:                 ?CT_LOG("Client Socket: ~p ~n", [Socket]),
  473:                 {ok, IntSocket} = gen_statem:call(Pid, {downgrade, self()}),
  474:                 {{Address,CPort},UDPSocket}=IntSocket,
  475:                 ?CT_LOG("Info: ~p~n", [inet:info(UDPSocket)]),
  476: 
  477:                 {ok, #config{transport_info = CbInfo, connection_cb = ConnectionCb,
  478:                              ssl = SslOpts0}} =
  479:                     ssl:handle_options(ClientOpts, client, Address),
  480:                 SslOpts = {SslOpts0, #socket_options{}, undefined},
  481: 
  482:                 ct:sleep(250),
  483:                 ?CT_LOG("Client second connect: ~p ~p~n", [Socket, CbInfo]),
  484:                 {ok, NewSocket} = ssl_gen_statem:connect(ConnectionCb, Address, CPort, IntSocket,
  485:                                                          SslOpts, self(), CbInfo, infinity),
  486:                 {replace, NewSocket}
  487:         end,
  488: 
  489:     Client0 ! {apply, self(), ReConnect},
  490:     receive
  491:         {apply_res, {replace, Res}} ->
  492:             ?CT_LOG("Apply res: ~p~n", [Res]),
  493:             ok;
  494:         ErrMsg ->
  495:             ?CT_LOG("Unhandled: ~p~n", [ErrMsg]),
  496:             ct:fail({wrong_msg, ErrMsg})
  497:     end,
  498: 
  499:     ok = ssl_test_lib:send(Client0, Msg3 = "from client 2"),
  500:     ok = ssl_test_lib:send(Server2, Msg4 = "from server 2 to client 2"),
  501:     {error, closed} = ssl_test_lib:send(Server,  "Should be closed"),
  502: 
  503:     Msgs2 = lists:sort([{Server2, Msg3}, {Client0, Msg4}]),
  504: 
  505:     Server2 ! {active_receive, Msg3},
  506:     Client0 ! {active_receive, Msg4},
  507: 
  508:     Msgs2 = lists:sort(flush()),
  509: 
  510:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server),
  511:     ssl_test_lib:close(Server2),
  512:     ssl_test_lib:close(Client0),
  513:     ok.
  514: 
  515: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  516: %% Internal functions ------------------------------------------------
  517: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
  518: 
  519: %% Helper function for init_per_testcase.
  520: test_listen_on_all_interfaces(S0, Config) ->
  521:     {ok, {_, Port}} = ssl:sockname(S0),
  522:     case ssl:listen(Port, [{protocol, dtls}, {ip, {0,0,0,0}}]) of
  523:         {ok, S1} ->
  524:             ssl:close(S0),
  525:             ssl:close(S1),
  526:             {skip, "Testcase is not supported on this OS."};
  527:         {error, _} ->
  528:             Config
  529:     end.
  530: 
  531: maybe_skip_tc_on_windows(Testcase, Config)
  532:   when Testcase =:= dtls_listen_two_sockets_5 orelse
  533:        Testcase =:= dtls_listen_two_sockets_6 ->
  534:     case os:type() of
  535:         {win32, _} ->
  536:             {skip, "Testcase not supported in Windows"};
  537:         _ ->
  538:             Config
  539:     end;
  540: maybe_skip_tc_on_windows(_, Config) ->
  541:     Config.
